gui.common
Interface IView

All Known Subinterfaces:
IAddItemBatchView, IAddProductGroupView, IAddProductView, IAddStorageUnitView, IEditItemView, IEditProductGroupView, IEditProductView, IEditStorageUnitView, IExpiredReportView, IInventoryView, IMainView, INoticesReportView, IProductStatsReportView, IRemovedReportView, IRemoveItemBatchView, ISupplyReportView, ITransferItemBatchView
All Known Implementing Classes:
AddItemBatchView, AddProductGroupView, AddProductView, AddStorageUnitView, DialogView, EditItemView, EditProductGroupView, EditProductView, EditStorageUnitView, ExpiredReportView, GUI, InventoryView, ItemBatchView, ItemView, NoticesReportView, ProductGroupView, ProductStatsReportView, ProductView, RemovedReportView, RemoveItemBatchView, StorageUnitView, SupplyReportView, TransferItemBatchView, View
public interface IView

IView defines functionality that is supported by all views in the program. Controllers invoke this functionality on their views.

Method Summary
